title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 11 February 2014 - XWiki
content:

08:57 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
09:01 <msmeria> vmassol: good morning  
09:01 <msmeria> can I upgrade the test wiki or will you do it ?  
09:10 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
09:25 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
09:28 <Denis1> has joined #xwiki  
09:40 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
09:43 <gdelhumeau> Hi  
09:43 <gdelhumeau> ci.xwiki.org does not answer  
09:46 <lucaa> has quit  
09:47 <tmortagne> gdelhumeau: seems to be that way pretty much every mornings  
09:48 <tmortagne> restarting it  
09:48 <tmortagne> done  
09:50 <UCC> has quit  
10:05 <vmassol> tmortagne: my guess is that the jeknins tmp files are removed every night but I hav"n't investigated yet  
10:12 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
10:24 <gdelhumeau> [ANN] Please do not commit on the 5.4.x branch anymore  
10:25 <vmassol> first, are we ready for the 5.4.1 release? any blocker remaining?  
10:25 <vmassol> I saw thomas fixed a blocker this morning which is pretty cool  
10:26 <gdelhumeau> Do not forget 5.4.1 is only about fixing important bugs discovered after 5.4.1 has been released  
10:26 <gdelhumeau> all you have in the roadmap should be done in 5.4.2  
10:26 <evalica> vmassol: have you read my messages?  
10:26 <vmassol> tmortagne: hmm so we still have a problem with the history?  
10:27 <vmassol> (the display of it)  
10:27 <tmortagne> vmassol: I edited a comment, not wrote a new one  
10:29 <vmassol> cool!  
10:36 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
10:37 <tmortagne> evalica: xwiki.org issue should be reported on INFRA yes  
10:37 <tmortagne> then moved to platform if that's a platform bug  
10:37 <evalica> thanks tmortagne  
10:38 <tmortagne> pretty much anything that is not in git is INFRA  
10:56 <gdelhumeau> I think http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-ui-5.4.x/lastBuild/org.xwiki.enterprise$xwiki-enterprise-test-ui/testReport/org.xwiki.test.ui.appwithinminutes/UserClassFieldTest/testSingleSelection/ is a flicker  
10:58 <silverdrop> has quit  
10:59 <msmeria> vmassol: hello  
11:06 <msmeria> has quit  
11:10 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
11:27 <gdelhumeau> FYI I do not start the release yet, I am waiting for jenkins to be all blue  
11:27 <gdelhumeau> and we have restarted it a fex minutes ago  
11:29 <lucaa> has quit  
11:45 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
11:47 <vmassol> it would be nice to verify that XINFRA-146 is not an issue with 5.4.1 maybe  
11:47 <vmassol> looks pretty serious to me  
11:57 <ClemensR> has joined #xwiki  
12:02 <ClemensR> I can reproduce XINFRA-146 with the jetty/hsql package for 5.4 however  
12:03 <ClemensR> however that is because the attachment to the issue is no propert zip file  
12:07 <ClemensR> if you look into the file you can even see the stack trace  
12:07 <ClemensR> Caused by: java.lang.NullPointerException: at org.xwiki.xar.internal.property.DefaultXarObjectPropertySerializer.write(DefaultXarObjectPropertySerializer.java:51)  
12:33 <vmassol> bb in 1 hour  
13:25 <evalica> has quit  
13:43 <ClemensR> tmortagne: do you know what the xar export format is expected to do if it runs into a null property-value ?  
13:50 <ClemensR> ah, looking at DateXarObjectPropertySerializer  it propably should output ""  
14:13 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
14:19 <CapNemo> has left #xwiki  
14:38 <tmortagne> ClemensR: it does not expect a null value  
14:39 <tmortagne> but I'm not sure which property we are talking about in XINFRA-146  
14:39 <ClemensR> seems someone send one to it, however  
14:39 <Denis1> is now known as <Denis>  
14:39 <ClemensR> I am not sure which property it is, but it certainly has a null value  
14:39 <tmortagne> ClemensR: look at my comment  
14:39 <tmortagne> teh ull value come right from a BaseProperty#.getValue()  
14:39 <tmortagne> but I don't know which property  
14:40 <tmortagne> and I don't know any property which contains null value  
14:40 <vmassol> caty provided the XAR so it should be easy to check in debug mode I guess  
14:40 <ClemensR> maybe it is a property from an object, where a new attribute has been introduced somewhen later on  
14:41 <evalica> well you can export in XAR format yourself since the page is on xwiki.org  
14:41 <tmortagne> vmassol: what fail is the export so no you can't use that XAR  
14:41 <ClemensR> yes, I tried and get a similar broken xar with a stack trace in it  
14:41 <vmassol> I can provide the mysql dump to anyone if you're interested  
14:42 <ClemensR> (narf, here I cannot access jira.xwiki.org - local trouble wiht the network. I wonder why  chat is still working ...)  
14:42 <vmassol> actually it's also easy to check directly in the xwiki.org DB  
14:42 <tmortagne> vmassol: it's easier to look at the document in a script directly in xwiki.org at least to understand where that null come from exactly, I will check it  
14:42 <vmassol> ok  
14:53 <ClemensR> has quit  
14:55 <tmortagne> ok so the null value come from the property parse in object 1 of class "XWiki.StyleSheetExtension"  
14:55 <tmortagne> this is a boolean property  
14:55 <tmortagne> boolean property class actually but a number property  
14:56 <tmortagne> a null number sounds pretty weird to be  
14:56 <tmortagne> s/be/me/  
14:57 <tmortagne> NumberProperty#toText() seems to think it's possible (unless it's just bulletproofing for bulletproofing)  
14:58 <tmortagne> from UI point of view parse is "---" so I guess that how null is used  
14:59 <tmortagne> anyway the export should not crash whatever the value, let do some bulletproofing  
15:03 <ClemensR> has joined #xwiki  
15:12 <GuillaumeF> has joined #xwiki  
15:14 <tmortagne> ClemensR: yes  
15:14 <tmortagne> forget that  
15:14 <tmortagne> I was looking at older message :)  
15:14 <tmortagne> export should be ok now  
15:14 <ClemensR> ah, ok ... well me got kicked by localnetwork problems anyway ;)  
15:19 <ClemensR> ah, the element should just not be shown for null values  
15:20 <ClemensR> so in some way the extra check in DateXarObjectPropertySerializer  would not really be necessary  
15:24 <tmortagne> I could have written a NumberXarObjectPropertySerializer but from what I can see putting empty string instead of null is how all properties behave  
15:24 <tmortagne> so yes I could remove the null check in DateXarObjectPropertySerializer  
15:24 <tmortagne> but DateXarObjectPropertySerializer is not only about that :)  
15:25 <ClemensR> yes, and I just mean "if I understand correctly, then in theory one could remove the null check" , not "hey, lets remove that null check in 5.4.1 and see if I got it right"  ;)  
15:35 <vmassol> hehe  
15:35 <vmassol> you beat me by 1 second evalica ;)  
15:35 <evalica> :)  
15:35 <vmassol> (well 1 min actually not second)  
15:41 <gdelhumeau> has quit  
15:43 <evalica> ClemensR: I guess if the code is now on contrib the version upload can be handle by maven … if you confide the extension page accordingly  
15:43 <evalica> \*configure  
15:44 <ClemensR> I guess that is not really necessary ... the pom is not set up for being build automatically  
15:44 <andreeapopescu> has quit  
15:50 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
15:51 <dpatriche> has quit  
15:53 <msmeria> has quit

16:32 <tmortagne> vmassol: so we want to keep 5.2 branch on jenkins (an in general) ?  
16:32 <tmortagne> s/an/and/  
16:32 <tmortagne> s/so/do/  
16:34 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
16:37 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: how is it going?  
16:37 <vmassol> need any help?  
16:37 <gdelhumeau> still waiting for jenkies to be stable  
16:38 <gdelhumeau> having some trouble with maven on my computer  
16:42 <vmassol> evalica: I'm starting to look at XINFRA-147  
16:42 <evalica> yes … I think I will report another issue related to it… give me 1 minute  
16:42 <tmortagne> vmassol: XINFRA-147 looks like a blocker if we can reproduce locally  
16:43 <vmassol> yes  
16:51 <andreeapopescu> has joined #xwiki  
16:51 <vmassol> evalica: i commented on the issue with my local test  
16:52 <vmassol> cannot reproduce so far  
16:52 <evalica> still testing  
17:15 <gdelhumeau> "screen" is not installed in the agent 1-1  
17:15 <gdelhumeau> but it is on maven.xwiki.org  
17:15 <gdelhumeau> could we install it on agent 1-1 or should I use those from maven.xwiki.org ?  
17:23 <evalica> vmassol: I am not able to reproduce it locally …  
17:27 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: why do you need screen?  
17:27 <gdelhumeau> vmassol: http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ReleasePlans/ReleasePlanHelp#HBuildtherelease  
17:27 <vmassol> ah to resume in case of problem I guess… i don't use it  
17:33 <vmassol> hmm strange gdelhumeau, I was pretty sure I applied the xar:format on 5.4 branch  
17:33 <vmassol> sorry about that  
17:33 <vmassol> I did this over the week end  
17:34 <gdelhumeau> np  
17:34 <vmassol> see https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/9bd9db05bf43d3c82e8aaefae685285c08f910f4  
17:34 <vmassol> ah I know  
17:34 <vmassol> I forgot enterprise  
17:34 <vmassol> I did platform only
